title: 1-Hour Anime Mix - Most Beautiful & Emotional - Epic Music | Anime Soundtracks OST
description: 1 Hour filled with the most beautiful and emotional ost from all kind of animes. Unique in its own way and worth a listen even if you don't watch animes _ Tracklist: 00:00 Shiki - Eau de Vie 02:47 Shiki - Day and Night 05:52 Tasogare Otome x Amnesia - Requiem 09:28 Toradora! - Lost my Pieces 11:23 Accel World - Blood History 13:06 Guilty Crown - κrOnё 15:55 Accel World - byebye 17:48 Tokyo Ghoul - Yukata Yamada - Soundtrack#1 21:58 Mirai Nikki - OST 2 Track 5 24:08 Bleach - Here to Stay 27:00 Bleach - Soundscape to Ardor 29:43 Code Geass - Madder Sky 32:34 Naruto Shippuuden - Tragic 34:58 Naruto Shippuuden - Sengunbanba (Experienced Many Battles) 36:46 Nisemonogatari - Bird of Death 38:54 Mirai Nikki - OST 9 - Track 8 40:11 Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood - Happiness 42:07 Fate/Stay Night - Unmei no Yoru 45:29 Fate/Stay Night - Kishi Ou no Hokori 47:48 Fate Zero - This Day And Never Again 49:39 One Piece - Uunan and the Stone Storage room 51:37 One Piece - The Fight Continues 53:12 Shingeki no Kyojin - Goodbye (gt20130218) 55:34 Sword Art Online - in your past 57:10 Sword Art Online - gracefully 58:46 Sword Art Online - a tiny love _ Picture by 雪漣月 pixiv profile: http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.ph...
